valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 26 Oct 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 27 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 1009 expected southwest of Bailey 992 by midday tomorrow. Low Bailey 992 moving steadily southeast and losing its identity
